experiences.title: Company Name Microsoft Student Chapter
experiences.description: As working in a well established Tech-Society, there are many responsibilities that fall upon us, like:• Study the objectives, promotional policies, or needs of organizations to develop public relations strategies that will influence promote ideas, products, or services.• Respond to requests for information from the media and help in handling regular Information flow and weekly events on our Social Media (Instagram & Facebook)• Helped in managing the one of the biggest online Event of our University "Abhyudaya" specifically in Social Media promotions and increasing Marketing reach of our event. … see more

experiences.title: Member (Tech Team)
experiences.description: Worked and developed software for an event called "Troubleshoot" using Python and excel based module (XLSXwriter) :• All round information was automatically generated by the given data and different trades were successfully conducted, including Auctions too!!• Different intermediate files were stored for resolving disputes by different teams and many other issuesAlso maintained website by using Google Sites and embedded code for different Post and images for automatic updates … see more

experiences.title: App Developer
experiences.description: It was great Experience to work for social cause in bad time of Corona Virus, As an app developer intern for 3 months i contributed for development of an App as follows:- • Worked for Authentication and Validation of users and organisations • Integrated Backend and DataBase on Cloud servers(Firebase)• Coordinated with systems partners to finalize design and confirm requirements• Ensured network, system and data availability and integrity through preventive maintenance and upgrades • Consistently met deadlines and requirements for all production work order Benefits for Migrate Workers :- • Through this we can collect data and help them by providing most predictable skills to sustain this pandemic. • Also various Social institutes & NGOs were enrolled in it. With a hope for better future of Migrate workers around our country, This app was made with ❤️ … see more
